plants.name: Tomatoes
plants.watering: Regular, even watering; keep soil moist but not soggy.
plants.climate: Warm climates; tolerates mild to hot conditions.
plants.additional_info: Stake or cage for support in small spaces. Ideal for containers.

plants.name: Basil
plants.watering: Moderate; water when the topsoil is dry.
plants.additional_info: Pinch off flowers to encourage leaf growth.

plants.name: Lettuce
plants.climate: Cool climates; bolting occurs in heat.
plants.additional_info: Harvest leaves continuously to encourage regrowth.

plants.name: Strawberries
plants.watering: Regular, keep soil moist but not waterlogged.
plants.additional_info: Best in containers or hanging baskets for space efficiency.

plants.name: Spinach
plants.additional_info: Bolts quickly in heat; grow in cooler weather.

plants.name: Kale
plants.sunlight: 6 hours of full sun; tolerates partial shade.
plants.additional_info: Harvest outer leaves first for continuous growth.

plants.name: Mint
plants.additional_info: Grows aggressively; keep in separate containers.

plants.name: Zucchini
plants.additional_info: Needs ample space or trellis support.

plants.name: Cucumbers
plants.watering: Consistent watering; avoid letting soil dry out.
plants.additional_info: Grows well on trellises to save space.

plants.name: Carrots
plants.soil_type: Loose, sandy soil for root growth.
plants.watering: Keep soil moist but not soggy.
plants.additional_info: Avoid rocky soil to prevent deformed roots.

plants.name: Radishes
plants.sunlight: 4-6 hours of sun; tolerates partial shade.
plants.additional_info: Fast-growing (harvest in 3-4 weeks).

plants.name: Eggplants
plants.additional_info: Needs staking for support in containers.

plants.name: Chives
plants.watering: Moderate; let the soil dry slightly between watering.
plants.additional_info: Perennial herb; regrows after cutting.

plants.name: Beets
plants.additional_info: Both roots and greens are edible.

plants.name: Onions
plants.additional_info: Grow in containers for green onions or bulbs.

plants.name: Thyme
plants.additional_info: Low-maintenance, aromatic herb.

plants.name: Rosemary
plants.additional_info: Excellent for containers and vertical gardens.

plants.name: Garlic
plants.best_season: Plant in fall, harvest in late spring.
plants.additional_info: Easy to grow in containers; great for pest control in gardens.

plants.name: Green Beans
plants.watering: Moderate; avoid letting soil dry out.
plants.additional_info: Trellis or pole support is recommended.

plants.name: Chili Peppers
plants.watering: Moderate, avoid letting soil dry out.
plants.additional_info: Requires staking in containers for support.
